name.ja: ジオメトリダッシュジャンプメルトダウン

short.ar: اندفع من خلال العقبات الهندسية، قفز وفقًا للإيقاع، وانصهر بالحواجز في هذا اللعبة البلاط الدقيقة المثيرة!
short.am: በየአለም መሰረት ሊያገኙ እናመልክት የሚያቃጥሉትን ገዛኛ ድምፅ እና የሚመጣጥን ምንዛሬ ፓለት፣ ዳሽና የህይወት ከፍተኛ ፓለት በዚህ መዝገበ ሆነ!
short.bg: Преодолявайте геометрични препятствия, скок до ритъма и разтапяйте бариери в тази напрегната платформена игра!
short.bn: জ্যাম মেল্টডাউন জ্যাম মেল্টডাউন এই হৃদয়বিদারক প্রিসিজন প্ল্যাটফর্মারে জুম্প করুন, জ্যাম্প করুন এবং মেল্টডাউন ব্যারিয়ারগুলি!
short.ca: Esquitxa a través d'obstacles geomètrics, salta al ritme i fon barreres en aquest precís plataformer que accelera el cor!
short.cs: Projíždějte geometrickými překážkami, skákejte podle rytmu a rozpouštějte bariéry v této srdceryvné precizní plošinovce!
short.da: Dash gennem geometriske forhindringer, hop til rytmen og smelte gennem barrierer i dette hjerte-pumpende præcisionsplatformspil!
short.de: Düse durch geometrische Hindernisse, springe im Rhythmus und schmelze Barrieren in diesem nervenzerreißenden Präzisionsplattformer!
short.el: Τρέξτε μέσα από γεωμετρικά εμπόδια, πηδήξτε στον ρυθμό και λιώστε τα εμπόδια σε αυτό το συναρπαστικό παιχνίδι πλατφόρμας ακριβείας!
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US: Dash through geometric obstacles, jump to the rhythm, and meltdown barriers in this heart-pounding precision platformer!
short.es: Atraviesa obstáculos geométricos, salta al ritmo y derrite barreras en este apasionante juego de plataformas de precisión.
short.es_419: Atraviesa obstáculos geométricos, salta al ritmo y derrite barreras en este emocionante juego de plataformas de precisión.
short.et: Jookse geomeetriliste takistuste vahel, hüppa rütmi järgi ja sulata barjääre selles südantlõhestavas täpsusplatvormeris!
short.fa: از موانع هندسی عبور کنید، به ریتم بپرید و در این بازی پلتفرم دقیق، موانع را ملت کنید!
short.fi: Syöksy geometristen esteiden läpi, hyppää rytmin mukaan ja sula esteet tässä sydäntäpäräyttävässä tarkkuusalustapalapelissä!
short.fil: Lumipad sa pamamagitan ng heometriko obstacles, mag-jump sa ritmo, at mag-meltdown ng mga harang sa puso-pounding precision…
short.fr: Traversez des obstacles géométriques, sautez au rythme et faites fondre les barrières dans ce jeu de plateforme de précision…
short.gu: જ્યોમેટ્રિક અવરોધોમાં ડેશ કરો, રિદમ પર જમ્પ કરો અને આ હૃદય-ધ્વનિવર્ધન નિશ્ચિત પ્લેટફોર્મરમાં અવરોધો મેલ્ટડાઉન કરો!
short.he: רוץ דרך מחלקות גיאומטריות, קפוץ לפי הריקוד והמסת את המחילות במשחק הפלטפורמה הדיוקית הזו המדהימה!
short.hi: ज्योमेट्रिक रुकावटों के माध्यम से दौड़ें, रिदम के साथ कूदें, और इस हार्ट-पाउंडिंग प्रेसिजन प्लेटफॉर्मर में बैरियर्स को मेल्टडाउन…
short.hr: Projurite kroz geometrijske prepreke, skačite prema ritmu i otopite barijere u ovoj uzbudljivoj igri precizne platforme!
short.hu: Száguldj geometriai akadályok között, ugrálj a ritmusra, és olvassz szét akadályokat ebben a szívverést gyorsító precíziós…
short.id: Meluncur melalui rintangan geometris, loncat sesuai irama, dan lelehkan penghalang dalam permainan platform presisi yang…
short.it: Schiva gli ostacoli geometrici, salta al ritmo e sciogli le barriere in questo emozionante platform di precisione che fa battere il…
short.ja: 幾何学的な障害物をかいくぐり、リズムに合わせてジャンプし、この心臓が高鳴るプレシジョンプラットフォーマーでバリアをメルトダウンさせよう！
short.kn: ಜಿಯೋಮೆಟ್ರಿಕ್ ಆವರ್ಧನಗಳ ಮೂಲಕ ದಾರಿಯಾಡಿ, ರಿದ್ಧಿಗೆ ಹಾರಿಕೊಳ್ಳಿ ಮತ್ತು ಈ ಹೃದಯಕ್ಷೇಪಕರ ಪ್ರಿಸಿಜನ್ ಪ್ಲ್ಯಾಟ್‌ಫಾರ್ಮರ್‌ನಲ್ಲಿ ಅಡೆತಡೆಗಳನ್ನು…
short.ko: 기하학적 장애물을 통과하고 리듬에 맞춰 점프하며 이 심장이 두근거리는 정밀 플랫폼 게임에서 장벽을 녹이세요!
short.lt: Skriestu per geometrinius kliūtis, šoktų pagal ritmą ir lydėtų barjerus šiame širdies plakimą sukeliančiame tikslumo platforminiame…
short.lv: Izlaidieties cauri ģeometriskajām šķēršļu ainām, lēciet ritmā un šķīstiet barjeras šajā sirds triecinošajā precizitātes platformerī!
short.ml: ജിയോമെട്രിക് അഡ്വെഞ്ചേഴ്സുകൾ മുഴുവൻ, രിദം എന്നൊരു താളായി പാടുകളിൽ ജംപ്പ് ചെയ്യുക, ഈ ഹൃദയ-മുറിയിൽ ഉണ്ടാക്കുന്ന ഓർമ്മക്കായി…
short.mr: ज्योमेट्रिक अडचणींमध्ये डॅश, रिदमच्या साथी उडा आणि ह्रदयास त्रासदायक प्रिसिजन प्लॅटफॉर्मरमध्ये बॅरियर्स मेल्टडाऊन करा!
short.ms: Tersilang melalui halangan geometri, melompat mengikut rentak, dan meleburkan penghadang dalam permainan platform ketepatan ini…
short.nl: Sjees langs geometrische obstakels, spring op het ritme en laat barrières smelten in deze hartverwarmende precisieplatformer!
short.no: Dra gjennom geometriske hindringer, hopp til rytmen, og smelt gjennom barrierer i dette hjertebankende presisjonsplattformspillet!
short.pl: Przebijaj się przez geometryczne przeszkody, skacz w rytmie i top bariery w tej bijącej serce grze platformowej o precyzji!
short.pt_BR: Atravesse obstáculos geométricos, pule no ritmo e derreta barreiras neste eletrizante jogo de plataforma de precisão!
short.pt_PT: Atravessa obstáculos geométricos, salta ao ritmo e derrete barreiras neste eletrizante jogo de plataforma de precisão!
short.ro: Fă-ți drum printre obstacolele geometrice, sări la ritm și topește barierele în acest platformer de precizie care îți face inima să…
short.ru: Пробегайте через геометрические препятствия, прыгайте в ритме и расплавляйте барьеры в этом захватывающем игровом платформере с…
short.sk: Prebíďte sa cez geometrické prekážky, skáčte podľa rytmu a roztápajte prekážky v tejto srdcervúcej precíznej platformerke!
short.sl: Prebijajte se skozi geometrijske ovire, skačite v ritmu in talite ovire v tej srčni platformi natančnosti!
short.sr: Prođite kroz geometrijske prepreke, skačite u ritmu i istopite barijere u ovoj uzbudljivoj preciznoj platformi!
short.sv: Susa genom geometriska hinder, hoppa i takt och smälta barriärer i detta hjärtklappande precisionsspelplattform!
short.sw: Ruka kupitia vikwazo vya kijiometri, piga mbizi kulingana na rafiki, na yeyusha vizuizi katika hii mchezo wa jukwaa la usahihi…
short.ta: ஜியோமெட்ரிக் ஆதாரங்களைத் தொடர்ந்து ஓடு, ரிதம் அனுப்பி, இந்த இதயம் துடிப்பதை அதிகரிக்கும் குழப்பமான நிறுவனத்தில் கடைகளை மெல்ட்டடவுன்…
short.te: జామ్యాట్రిక్ అవరోధాలను దాటండి, రిదమ్‌కు ఆతుక్కోండి మరియు ఈ హృదయం పరికరిస్తున్న అచూక ప్లాట్‌ఫార్మర్‌లో అవరోధాలను మెల్ట్డౌన్ చేయండి!
short.th: วิ่งผ่านอุปสรรคทางเรขาคณิตกรรม กระโดดตามจังหวะ และละลายอุปสรรคในเกมแพลตฟอร์มที่มีความแม่นยำที่เต็มไปด้วยความตื่นเต้นนี้!
short.tr: Geometrik engeller arasından hızla geç, ritme göre sıçra ve bu kalp atışları hızlandıran hassas platform oyununda engelleri erit!
short.uk: Пробігайте геометричні перешкоди, стрибайте в ритмі та танцюйте бар'єри в цій захоплюючій грі-платформері з точністю!
short.vi: Chạy qua những trở ngại hình học, nhảy theo nhịp và làm tan chảy rào cản trong trò chơi nền tảng chính xác này đầy kịch tính!
short.zh_CN: 穿越几何障碍，跟着节奏跳跃，在这款引人入胜的精准平台游戏中融化障碍！
short.zh_TW: 穿越幾何障礙，跟著節奏跳躍，在這款引人入勝的精準平台遊戲中融化障礙！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Embark on a pulse-pounding adventure in "Geometry Dash Jump Meltdown" the latest addition to the critically acclaimed Geometry Dash series! Get ready to jump, flip, and dash through a world filled with rhythmic obstacles, electrifying challenges, and mind-bending geometry.

Key Features:

1. Electrifying Gameplay:

Immerse yourself in a fast-paced, heart-pounding experience as you navigate through a world of geometric madness.
Test your reflexes and coordination in a series of challenging levels that will push your skills to the limit.
2. Rhythmic Soundtrack:

Groove to the beat of an adrenaline-pumping soundtrack that synchronizes perfectly with the gameplay.
Each jump, flip, and dash is a dance move in this rhythm-infused adventure.
3. Dynamic Levels:

Explore a variety of meticulously designed levels, each with its own unique challenges and obstacles.
Encounter gravity-defying platforms, pulsating spikes, and other surprises that will keep you on the edge of your seat.
4. Customization:

Personalize your gameplay experience with a range of customizable characters and skins.
Unlock unique icons and colors to stand out from the crowd as you conquer each level.
5. Endless Challenges:

Push your skills to the limit with an endless mode that continuously generates new levels for you to conquer.
Compete with players from around the world and climb the leaderboards to prove you're the ultimate Geometry Dash master.
6. Intuitive Controls:

Enjoy a seamless gaming experience with easy-to-learn controls that make it accessible for players of all skill levels.
Master the art of precision as you navigate through intricate obstacles with precision and finesse.
7. Stunning Visuals:

Immerse yourself in a visually striking world of vibrant colors and mesmerizing geometric patterns.
Experience eye-catching visual effects that enhance the overall excitement of the game.
Prepare yourself for an adrenaline-fueled journey where timing is everything, and only the most skilled players will triumph. Are you ready to take on the challenge and become a Geometry Dash legend? Jump into the Meltdown now!

HOW TO PLAY
You can move the character with the mouse or trackpad.

HOW TO INSTALL
Click download this Extension using the "Add to Chrome" button.

Once the game has finished loading, simply select the "Extensions Icon" button. 

After clicking this, you'll be directed to the playground area, where the game "Geometry Dash Jump Meltdown" will launch automatically. All that's left is to press the play button and start enjoying the game.
